data.name: ActivateMailBodyFreeTrial

data.name: ActivateMailBodyFreeTrialPlainText
data.value: You can start trying AxCrypt Premium features for 30 days in the app!

data.name: ActivateMailBodyIntro
data.value: You have signed up to use AxCrypt. To complete the process you must verify your email address.

data.name: ActivateMailBodyManualLink
data.value: To verify manually, go to {0} and enter {1} and the verification code {2} .

data.name: ActivateMailBodyManualLinkPlainText
data.value: To verify manually, go to {0} and enter {1} and the verification code {2} .

data.name: ActivateManuallyPageBody
data.value: Stop! You should only be here because clicking on the link in the AxCrypt ID activation e-mail from AxCrypt did not work. (You must of course register for an AxCrypt ID to get an activation e-mail) Enter your e-mail and code manually here only if you have received the activation e-mail, but the link did not work.

data.name: ActivatePageBody
data.value: To activate your AxCrypt ID {0} you must select a password. Choose something difficult to guess, since it will protect passwords in the online password manager as well as access to the site. Type slowly and carefully, and do not forget your password!

data.name: ActivateSuccess
data.value: Your AxCrypt ID has been activated! Please sign in.

data.name: ActiveFileToolTip
data.value: Double-click opens a Password-dialog before opening the secured file.

data.name: AddSecureFolderTitle
data.value: Select a folder to keep secured with AxCrypt. Existing files will be encrypted now.
data.comment: Displayed as prompt, title or description when adding a new secure folder via a folder browser.

data.name: AlreadyVerifiedInfo
data.value:
Oops. You already verified your account, that's great!
Please sign in using the same password you used then.
data.comment: A brief informative message the account is already verified, and to please use the password already set to sign in.

data.name: AlwaysOffline

data.comment: A tool tip explaining that this causes AxCrypt never to access the Internet.

data.name: AnonymousRenameToolTip
data.value: Hide the real name of a secured file by renaming it to something random.

data.name: ApplicationTitle
data.comment: Title of mobile application

data.name: AuthenticationError
data.value: The page you tried to visit requires authentication. Please sign in to proceed.

data.name: AutoDeletionEmailOutro
data.value: You do not need to respond or do anything. If you do nothing, no more e-mails will be sent and your AxCrypt ID account will be deleted permanently.
data.comment: The final text in the auto deletion e-mail, stating that if you do nothing no more e-mail will be sent and the account will be deleted.

data.name: AutoDeletionMailBodyIntro
data.value: You gave us your e-mail as part of installing or using AxCrypt, through an app or the web. We sent you an activation code via e-mail, but you've not used it. If you do not immediately verify your AxCrypt ID account by using the activation code we'll be removing you permanently from our system.

data.name: AutoDeletionMailBodyTitle
data.value: We're about to delete your AxCrypt ID!
data.comment: The title of the deletion e-mail

data.name: AutoDeletionMailSubject
data.value: Your AxCrypt ID account will soon be deleted!

data.name: ColumnFolderHeader

data.name: ConfigurationSuccess
data.value: The application configuration property was updated successfully. You might have to restart the server to make the changes take effect.

data.name: ConfirmAllCheckBoxText
data.value: Do this for all remaining files?

data.name: CookiePolicyBlockedError
data.value: The action was blocked because cookies are disabled in your browser.

data.name: CookiePolicyPageBody
data.value:
We do not store permanent cookies on your hard disk, we set a few session cookies that are removed when the web browser is closed. They are necessary to keep your sign in session valid and secure. We do not track your use of the site, nor are they available to any third party.
The cookies are further secured by requiring that all sensitive communication with the server is encrypted with HTTPS, by encrypting the cookie itself and by making the cookie unavailable to script in your browser.
If you do not accept our temporary session cookies you cannot sign in and the site may not perform as expected.

data.name: CookiesDisabledError
data.value: Cookies appear to be disabled in your browser. Unless you accept session cookies from us you cannot sign in and the site may not perform as expected. Read more in our cookie policy.

data.name: CreateAccountToolStripMenuItemToolTipText

data.name: InternetNotRequiredInformation
data.value:
Internet is NOT REQUIRED to use AxCrypt.
Internet access is recommended, and required for Premium activation. Some features work better and critical updates may not reach you otherwise.
Your password is not stored on our servers, and the connection is always encrypted.

Enable automatic conversion of AxCrypt 1.x files (recommended)?

data.name: NotFoundPageBody
data.value: Unfortunately we could not find the page you were looking for. This might be due to a server restart that caused your browser session to become outdated, or some other server error that caused us to be unable to process the request. Requested page: {2} Your request has been logged. Please try again with the correct path, or report a broken link. To return to the start page, click here.

data.name: NotFoundSafePageBody
data.value: Unfortunately we could not find the page you were looking for. This might be due to a server restart that caused your browser session to become outdated, or some other server error that caused us to be unable to process the request. Your request has been logged. Please try again with the correct path, or report a broken link. To return to the start page, click here.

data.name: OfflineAccountBePatient
data.value: This may take a few minutes. Please be patient.

data.name: OfflineNoPremiumWarning
data.value: You're offline with no valid Premium subscription. Go online and purchase or update your license.

data.name: OldVersionTooltip
data.value: Your version is old. Please click to check for a newer version.

data.name: OpenToolStripButtonToolTipText
data.value: Click to select a secured file to open.

data.name: OptionsConvertMenuItemText
data.comment: The menu text for the option to automatically convert legacy 1.x files to AxCrypt 2 format.

data.name: OptionsConvertMenuToolTip
data.value: Enable or disable the automatic upgrade and conversion of older AxCrypt 1.x files as they are used.
data.comment: The tool tip explanation for the option to enable auto conversion of legacy 1.x files

data.name: PasswordManagementListPageBody
data.value: Manage all your passwords online in the cloud with AxCrypt Password Management, your online safety deposit for passwords, codes, pins, etc. Your passwords are stored in a securely encrypted archive and are available to you, and only you, anywhere at any time. [Collapse]... [Read more]

data.name: PasswordPolicyViolation
data.value: The password is not good enough to be acceptable.

data.name: PasswordResetHyperLink
data.comment: The URL to a web page where a password can be reset

data.name: PasswordResetMailBody1
data.value: You have requested to reset your AxCrypt ID password. This will not restore access to encrypted files or passwords, it will only let you sign in again. To complete this process and pick a new password, please click the button below.

data.name: PasswordResetPageBody
data.value: If you have previously registered but have forgotten the password, or for some reason not received or lost the activation link, you may re-register and request a new activation e-mail here. If you have forgotten your password this will allow you to sign in again, but you will not re-gain access to any encrypted files or information stored in the online password manager. It remains encrypted with your old password, and we cannot decrypt it. Enter your e-mail below to a send an activation or password reset link to the specified address. For personal integrity reasons, no feedback on the success or failure of this operation will be given.

data.name: PasswordResetSuccess
data.value: An attempt to send the AxCrypt ID activation verification code to {0} has been made. Please check your e-mail inbox. If you appear not to receive it, check that it does not get caught by your anti-spam measures, and that {0} is correct.

data.name: PasswordRulesInfo
data.value:
AxCrypt has a sophisticated password strength evaluator based on measuring the actual strength of the password. It must also be at least 8 effective characters long.
We evaluate the password by estimating the strength, which is based on how long and complex the password is.
The evaluation entirely disregards parts of the password that is recognized as being among the 1,000 most common passwords, as well as white space. For example the password 'secretX password Y 123456' is evaluated as just 'XY', since spaces, 'secret', 'password' and '123456' are ignored!
We classify the password in 4 categories of increasing strength, were we do not accept any password in the lowest category. The above example is not accepted for that reason.
data.comment: A text describing the rules for passwords for AxCrypt. Pure text. For HTML views, newlines must be replaced, and possibly wrap it with a CSS style.

data.name: PasswordStrengthBadTip
data.value: Password is too weak to be safe to use.
data.comment: Status 'Red' We'll accept it, but it's really not a good idea!

data.name: PasswordStrengthStrongTip
data.value: Password is strong and good enough to recommend.
data.comment: Status 'Green'. This is a really good password!

data.name: PasswordStrengthUnacceptableTip
data.value: Password is too short or too similar to a common password to be acceptable.
data.comment: Shown when no password is typed or it is effectively empty

data.name: PasswordStrengthWeakTip
data.value: Password is not strong enough to be recommended.
data.comment: Status 'Orange'. It's almost an ok password, but it's not good enough to be really recommended.

data.name: PortugueseBrazilLanguageSelection
data.comment: The name of the Portuguese Brazil language. Do not translate.

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody0Html
data.value: Your AxCrypt Premium subscription is coming to an end soon. I sincerely hope you have enjoyed using our features and found them useful.

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody1Html
data.value: I’d love for you to continue using our Premium features. Simply sign in to your AxCrypt ID here to subscribe at any time.
data.comment: {0} is the root URL to the account site. {1} is the URL-encoded e-mail adress.

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody2Html
data.value: With your Premium subscription you will continue to enjoy:

data.name: PremiumExpiresSoonMailBody3Html
data.value: Let me know what you think about AxCrypt - Will you continue to use it and is there something that you would like to see improved?

data.value: Your AxCrypt Premium subscription expires soon!

data.name: PremiumFeatureToolTipText

data.name: PremiumNeededForKeyShare

data.value: Remember me and extend sign in session

data.value: Description (related web site, user name etc)

data.name: PurchaseErrorSubscriptionTime
data.value: The selected subsciption time is invalid. A valid subscription has to be at least {0} month and no longer than {1} months.

data.name: PurchasePageBody1
data.value:
With Premium you can use AxCrypt to its full potential on any number of computers and devices.
AxCrypt is designed around the primary concept of keeping your files secure. To use advanced features such as 256-bit encryption, Secured Folders and Password Management we recommend you to upgrade to AxCrypt Premium. With AxCrypt Premium you will have the entire AxCrypt client at your disposal, without limitations.
To try the premium features we offer you a 30 days free trial of AxCrypt Premium that starts when you activate your AxCrypt ID. After that you can extend your premium subscription by using the form below.

data.name: PurchasePageBody2
data.value: [Read more about PayPal]Security is crucial to us. Everything we do with AxCrypt is done with security as the highest priority. We are therefore using PayPal as payment method for AxCrypt Premium. The PayPal site is highly secure and automatically encrypts your confidential information in transit from your computer to our servers. Once your information reaches the PayPal site, it resides on a server that is heavily guarded both physically and electronically. [Collapse]

data.name: PurchaseReceiptErrorPageBody
data.value: We never received your payment. This may result from manually cancelling the purchase on PayPal or due to insufficient account balance.

data.name: PurchaseReceiptSuccess
data.value: Thank you for purchasing AxCrypt Premium!

data.name: PurchaseReceiptSuccessPageBody
data.value:
You're now able to access all the premium features of AxCrypt. If you experience any problems, please contact our support.
A receipt of your purchase has been sent to your e-mail.

data.name: PurchaseVatPercent
data.value: VAT excluded. Actual VAT depends on your country of residence and will be displayed on the payment page.

data.name: RegisterError
data.value: Registration failed. Please check your e-mail and try again.

data.name: RegisterPageBody
data.value:
To start using AxCrypt you have to sign up for an AxCrypt ID by submitting your e-mail address in the form below. A message containing an activation link will then be sent to the specified address and when you click that link you will be asked to choose a password. That's it!
A 30 day trial of AxCrypt Premium is included and will start when you activate your AxCrypt ID.

data.name: RegisterPageTitle
data.value: Sign up for an AxCrypt ID

data.name: RegisterSuccess
data.value: You have now signed up for an AxCrypt ID! Check your e-mail {0} for an activation link.

data.name: ReliabilityUpdateAvailableWarning
data.value: Your software needs to be updated due to a reliability issue.
data.comment: Displayed prominently, perhaps as a pop-up, when it's discovered that an update is available the contains a reliability fix.

data.name: RemoveRecentFileToolStripMenuItemText
data.value: Remove from list but keep file secured

data.name: ReportSnapshotIntro
data.value:
This is a snapshop report of detected errors in AxCrypt. Please copy all of this text and e-mail to:
To: support@axcrypt.net Subject: AxCrypt Report Snapshot
data.comment: Included as the first part of a snapshot report with logged errors etc.

data.name: ResendButtonText
data.comment: A button in a verification dialog that causes the verification to be resent.

data.name: ResendButtonToolTip
data.value: Click to resend the activation code to your e-mail.

data.name: RussianLanguageSelection
data.comment: The name of the Russian Language in Russian. It should never be translated.

data.name: SameFilePasswordAsSignedInError
data.value: You are already signed in with this password! Please provide the original password for this file.
data.comment: If a user is prompted for a password for a file, and types the same as already signed in, this indicates a misunderstanding and should be explained.

data.name: SaveSecretErrorIsReadOnly
data.value: Only premium users are allowed to save password entries.

data.name: SecretsWarningIsReadOnly
data.value: Your premium subscription has expired and you can therefore no longer edit or create new password entries. However, you still have read-only access.

data.name: SecretsWarningIsSoonExpired
data.value: Your premium subscription expires soon, on {0}. Thereafter you'll have to extend your premium subscription to be able to edit or create new password entries. You'll retain read-only access indefinitely.

data.name: SecurityUpdateAvailableWarning
data.value: Your software needs to be updated due to a security issue.
data.comment: Displayed prominently, perhaps as a pop-up, when it's discovered that an update is available the contains a security fix.

data.name: SettingsDeletePageBody
data.value: Here you can delete your AxCrypt ID permanently from the system. All data associated with your AxCrypt ID, including saved password entries, will also be deleted. Enter your password below to a delete your AxCrypt ID.

data.name: SettingsEmailPageBody
data.value:
To change the e-mail associated with your AxCrypt ID, type in a new e-mail address below. This will affect how you sign in to the site and where site e-mails are sent.
A confirmation e-mail will be sent to the new address. The change is effective only after the confirmation link is clicked and a successful sign in.

data.name: SettingsNotificationsPageBody
data.value: Choose your preference for AxCrypt notification e-mails below.

data.name: SettingsPasswordPageBody
data.value:
To change password, provide the current password and then specify and verify your new password.
Choose something difficult to guess, since it will protect passwords in the online password manager as well as access to the site. Type slowly and carefully, and do not forget your new password!

data.name: SharedWithUnverifiedMessagePattern
data.value:
You are about to share securely with someone who has received but not yet responded to an invitation to use AxCrypt.
Please consider informing '{0}' directly about AxCrypt file security.

data.name: SiteRestartWarning
data.value: Warning! A site restart is scheduled in a few minutes. We're sorry about the inconvenience.

data.name: SpanishLanguageToolStripMenuItemText
data.comment: Do Not Translate

data.name: StopSecuringToolTipText
data.value: Click to select files to stop securing.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorAmount
data.value: Invalid format for field Amount. Please use decimal format, i.e. 10.50.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorEventTime
data.value: Internal error: Invalid format in field Event time.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorExpirationTime
data.value: Internal error: Invalid format in field Expiration time.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorLevel
data.value: Internal error: Invalid value in field Subscription level.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorLevelAmount
data.value: Internal error: Invalid value in field Subscription level. If we've paid for something, we currently only support subscription level Basic.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorStartTime
data.value: Internal error: Invalid format in field Start time.

data.name: SubscriptionsErrorType
data.value: Internal error: Invalid value in field Subscription type.

data.name: SubscriptionsSuccessDelete
data.value: The subscription history was successfully deleted.

data.name: SupportPremiumIntro
data.value: Welcome to AxCrypt Support. We give our Premium subscribers prioritized and personal direct support via e-mail.

data.name: SupportWarningOnlyPremium
data.value: Sorry, direct support is only available to paying subscribers, please visit our community support.

data.name: TextPreferenceCritical
data.value: Critical - Get notified of critical AxCrypt updates

data.name: TextPreferenceDecline
data.value: Decline - Never get notified about AxCrypt updates

data.name: TextPreferenceUnknown
data.value: Unknown - You have not specified any preference

data.name: TextPreferenceUpdate
data.value: Update - Get notified of all AxCrypt updates

data.name: TitleSignInToAxCrypt
data.comment: Title on the web page for signin for example.

data.name: ToolTipPremiumNeededForSecrets
data.value: Premium is required for password management. Click to upgrade now!

data.name: TrayBalloonTooltip
data.value: Click to restore the AxCrypt application window.
data.comment: Previous text: Double-click to restore the AxCrypt application window.

data.name: TrialPremiumStartInfo
data.value:
Great! Now you can use all features of AxCrypt for free during the trial period.
Good Luck and Enjoy,
The AxCrypt Team
data.comment: A short message congratulating the user on having started the trial period.

data.name: TryPremiumLabel
data.comment: A clickable link with text similar to "Try Premium"

data.name: TryPremiumToolTip
data.value: You are not using the highest level of security. Click to try Premium for free now!
data.comment: A tooltip explaining that a user can get a free trial of premium by clicking on the link.

data.name: UnknownCrypto
data.comment: Displayed when an unknown CryptoId is encountered.

data.name: UnknownLogOn
data.value: Password is not previously known. Click 'New' to create a new.

data.name: UnregisterMailBody1
data.value: This is confirmation that your AxCrypt ID on AxCrypt.net has been successfully deleted.

data.name: UnregisterMailBody2
data.value: We're sad to see you go and hope you enjoyed your time with us!

data.name: UpgradeLegacyFilesMenuToolTip
data.value: Select a place to search for files secured with AxCrypt 1.x and upgrade them.

data.name: UpgradePromptText
data.comment: One-word text for a link-label text asking the user to upgrade to premium.

data.name: UserSettingsFormatChangeNeedsReset
data.value: You have updated AxCrypt. Unfortunately, your configuration must be reset. After restarting, your preferences and settings will unfortunately be lost. We apologize for the inconvenience. Your encrypted files are still safe and ok.

data.name: WarningTitle
data.comment: The title of a pop up or dialog with a warning.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody1Html
data.value: I’m really happy that you have signed up! To make you feel really welcome, I’ve given you free access to our Premium functions for 30 days.

data.name: WelcomeMailBody2Html
data.value: With AxCrypt Free or AxCrypt Premium, you can secure your files in a truly easy way. Encrypting your files and entire folders is just a click away. Working with the encrypted files is just as easy too!

data.name: WelcomeMailBody3Html
data.value: As a Premium subscriber there are a number of excellent additional features for you on top of all the regular free functionality. With Premium you're getting features like:

data.name: WelcomeToAxCrypt
data.value:
Welcome to AxCrypt!
Using AxCrypt is really easy. Start with the main window, or use double-click and right-click in Windows Explorer for fully integrated use.
To encrypt your first files, click the + icon in the toolbar and select them.
For more information, click OK to open a web browser to our web site.

data.name: WixAxNeedUninstall
data.value: You must uninstall the currently installed AxCrypt on this computer first.

data.name: WixAxOsNotSupported
data.value: This computer's version of Windows is not supported.

data.name: WixCaption
data.comment: [WixBundlePart] should NOT be translated.

data.name: WixConfirmCancelMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel?

data.name: WixFailureHyperlinkLogText
data.value: One or more issues caused the setup to fail. Please fix the issues and then retry setup. For more information see the <a href="#">log file</a>.

data.name: WixFailureRestartText
data.value: You must restart your computer to complete the rollback of the software.

data.name: WixFilesInUseCloseRadioButton
data.value: Close the applications and attempt to restart them.

data.name: WixFilesInUseDontCloseRadioButton
data.value: Do not close applications. A reboot will be required.

data.name: WixFilesInUseLabel
data.value: The following applications are using files that need to be updated:

data.name: WixHelpText
data.value:
/install | /repair | /uninstall | /layout [directory] - installs, repairs, uninstalls or creates a complete local copy of the bundle in directory. Install is the default.
/passive | /quiet - displays minimal UI with no prompts or displays no UI and no prompts. By default UI and all prompts are displayed.
/norestart - suppress any attempts to restart. By default UI will prompt before restart. /log log.txt - logs to a specific file. By default a log file is created in %TEMP%.
data.comment: The /install, /uninstall and all other /xxxxxx shold NOT BE TRANSLATED

data.name: WixInstallAcceptCheckbox
data.value: I agree to the license terms and conditions

data.name: WixInstallVersion
data.comment: [WixBundleVersion] should NOT BE TRANSLATED

data.name: WixMsiArpComments
data.comment: The title in Control Panel add/remove

data.name: WixMsiDescription
data.comment: Description in MSI

data.name: WixMsiDoNotInstall32BitOn64Bit
data.value: This is a 32 bit MSI installer. You have 64-bit Windows. Get the MSI with 'x64' in the filename instead of 'Win32'.

data.name: WixMsiExitDialogText
data.value: QUICK START: To encrypt a file, right-click the file in Windows Explorer and select AxCrypt | Encrypt.
data.comment: The final message in the MSI installer

data.name: WixMsiExternalName
data.comment: How AxCrypt is written for users

data.name: WixMsiFileTypeName
data.comment: How encrypted files are named in Windows Explorer

data.name: WixMsiLaunchAxCryptDescription
data.comment: Start Menu tooltip to start AxCrypt

data.name: WixMsiLegacyAxCrypt
data.value: You must uninstall the previous version of AxCrypt before proceeding. Be sure to reboot when asked to.
data.comment: Error message when too old AxCrypt is already installed.

data.name: WixMsiMainExecutablesTitle
data.comment: Feature name in installer

data.name: WixMsiNet45Required
data.value: This application requires .NET Framework 4.5 or higher. Please install the .NET Framework then run this installer again.
data.comment: Error message when .NET 4.5 is missing

data.name: WixMsiNoDowngrade
data.value: Newer or same version already installed! Please uninstall that version before proceeding. Be sure to reboot when asked to.
data.comment: Error message during installation when a newer version already is installed.

data.name: WixMsiShellExtensionTitle
data.comment: Feature name for the shell extension during installation

data.name: WixMsiStartAxCrypt
data.comment: Prompt to start AxCrypt after installation

data.name: WixSuccessRestartText
data.value: You must restart your computer before you can use the software.

data.name: WrongFileExtensionWarning
data.value: '{0}' has the wrong file name extension. It must be '{1}'!

data.name: WrongVerificationCode
data.value: Wrong activation code. Please re-check you email.

data.name: WrongVerificationCodeFormat
data.value: The verfication code must be exactly 6 digits.
